name: Tideguard Shoal

branding_data.short_description: A reimagined R-Type game with an aquatic theme, focusing on diverse oceanic environments and the importance of sustainability and ethics in marine life.
branding_data.detailed_description: Tideguard Shoal is an engaging side-scrolling shooter inspired by classic R-Type games, but set in the vibrant and diverse underwater worlds of oceans, seas, and rivers. Players pilot a unique submersible ship through an ever-changing aquatic landscape, encountering both the serene beauty and perilous threats of underwater ecosystems. Each level emphasizes the diversity of marine environments, showcasing coral reefs, deep-sea trenches, and bustling riverbanks, each with distinct visuals and challenges. Central to the game is a focus on ethics and sustainability; players must choose their battles wisely to avoid harming endangered species or damaging fragile ecosystems. Unlockable upgrades emphasize eco-friendly technology, promoting balance and harmony. With a variety of missions that include ecological preservation, players navigate a richly animated aquatic world, constantly balancing firepower with ethical considerations.
